name: kahla

scripts.build: yarn workspace @aiursoft/kahla.sdk build && yarn workspace @aiursoft/kahla.app build
scripts.lint: yarn workspace @aiursoft/kahla.sdk lint && yarn workspace @aiursoft/kahla.app lint
scripts.clean: yarn workspace @aiursoft/kahla.sdk clean && yarn workspace @aiursoft/kahla.app clean

description: Kahla is a cross-platform business messaging app.
author: Aiursoft <service@aiursoft.com> (https://www.aiursoft.com/)
